name: ESCORT DUTY
title: Pathway to Thorin
target: Deliver the Crystal south to the city of Thorin. King Galamar must survive.
dialog.0: Your Highness, I do not like the look of this forest, we must be careful!
dialog.1: Very well, Captain. Let us follow this path and stay on our guard.
dialog.2: Ambush! Protect the Crystal at all cost!
dialog.3: This seems to be the last of them...
